lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: Why was Paul beaten and jailed in Jerusalem?
answers: They thought he brought a Greek man into the temple
They thought he stole money from the temple
They thought he was a Roman soldier
They thought he was saying bad things about Moses

questions.question: Who appeared to Paul while he was a prisoner, and what was he told?
answers: Jesus told Paul he would share the good news in Rome
Peter told Paul to go back home
An angel told Paul to stop preaching
A guard told Paul he was going free

questions.question: Why did Paul and other prisoners get on a ship?
answers: To sail to Rome
To sail to Egypt
To sail to Jerusalem
To sail to Nineveh

questions.question: Why did Paul tell the commander to spend the winter at Fair Havens?
answers: Sailing that time of year was dangerous and the ship would be lost
Fair Havens had the best food
Paul wanted to visit friends there
The ship needed a new sail right away

questions.question: What happened when they ignored Paul’s advice and left Fair Havens?
answers: A windstorm blew them far off course
The sea became calm and easy
They arrived in Rome the next day
A giant whale swallowed the ship

questions.question: Who came to speak to Paul on the ship, and what did they say?
answers: An angel said Paul would reach Rome. The ship would wreck, but everyone would live
A sailor said the storm would stop soon
An evil spirit said Paul would drown
A prisoner told Paul to stop speaking about Jesus

questions.question: How long did the bad weather last?
answers: Two weeks
Two months
Two years
Two days

questions.question: What did Paul tell the men to do the morning of the shipwreck?
answers: Eat some food because God wouldn’t let them lose a single hair
Jump into the sea immediately
Tear down the sails
Practice their swimming strokes

questions.question: How did the sailors make it to the island safely?
answers: They swam or held onto floating pieces of the boat
They used life boats
They built a bridge to shore
They walked across the water

questions.question: What happened to Paul on the island of Malta?
answers: He was bitten by a venomous snake but survived
He got lost in the jungle
He ate some poisonous fruit
He decided to stay on the island forever
